document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
148 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , IMC ) from 15 provinces were studied.
Crimea
:
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Chornomorske Distr. , Tarkhankut Cape
,
Jangul Nature Reserve , V . Martynov

leg., 17.vi.1996 ;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Krasnogvardeysk Distr. , woodland belt,
22.vii.1950
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Dzhankoy , Vyselki , pasture, Bogachev leg.,
9.v.1952
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Kacha River ,
24.vii.1947
;
2 spec. ( IMC ) Nyzhniohirskyi Distr. , sovkhoz Prymorye , I. Maltsev leg.,
19.vi.1951
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Sevastopol ,
29.iv.1977
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Sevasopol , W. Pliginski leg., 1.vi
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Simferopol , I. Maltsev leg.,
15.v.1954
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol , Yu. Wagner
;
1 spec. ( SIZK )
10 km N Armyansk
, coastof Karkinitsky Gulf , S
.
V . Volovnik leg.,
16.v.1982
;
Kherson Prov.
: 1 spec. ( IMC ) Black Sea , Dovgyj Island ,
17.vi.1956
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Kherson , I. Maltsev leg.,
6.vi.1956
;

: 1 spec. ( IMC ) Dovzhansk Distr. , Provalskyi Step Nature Reserve , forest, A. Bartenev leg.,
18.vi.1972
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Striletskyi Step Nature Reserve , Petrusenko leg.,

;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Ochakiv Distr. , Porutino, S
.
V . Volovnik leg.,
24.v.1982
;

.
V . Volovnik leg.,
24.iv.1983
.

Biology. Salty grasslands, ruderal habitats, beet plantations. Adults occur in IV–IX. Imago polyphagous, larva oligophagous on Chenopodioideae ( Amaranthaceae ) ( Pospelov 1913 ; Auersch 1954 , 1961a , 1961b , 1961c ; Volovnik 1988 ).
Notes. Principal pest of beet in Ukraine (Zverezomb-Zubovski 1956; Petrukha 1959 ; Fedorenko & Strukova 2012).
